luisjg.title: luisjg.dev
luisjg.details: Designed and implemented by yours truly, this single page web application serves as a playground to hone my development skills.
luisjg.tech_stack: The SPWA is written in Vuejs, Bulma CSS, and Momentjs. It follows ARIA accessibility guidelines as well as utilizing a colorblind friendly color pallette.

calstatepays.title: CalStatePays
calstatepays.details: This Single Page Web Application was part of a research grant which analyzed earnings data accross 5 Cal State University campuses accross the Metro LA area. The aim was to show that staying in school and completing a degree yields higher wages.
calstatepays.tech_stack: The SPWA is written in Vuejs, Bootstrap CSS, E-Charts, and Laravel. The back end is composed of various API endpoints which get cached and consumed on the front end.

web_services.title: META+LAB APIs
web_services.details: These set of APIs provide developers an easy way to get up and running with their CSUN specific applications.
web_services.tech_stack: All of the APIs are written with Laravel Lumen and are set-up to avoid any CORS issues.

faculty.title: Faculty
faculty.description: Get to know CSUN's unique Faculty.
faculty.details: This Laravel application is used to highlight CSUN's diverse Faculty as well as serve as a hub for students to easily find their Faculty's office hours, sillabi, research interests, and contact information.
faculty.tech_stack: The application is written in Laravel, CSS, HTML, JavaScript. It utilizes different internal APIs for class schedule, office hours, class location, as well as OpenStreetMaps for the map itself. All of the API requests are saved to a cache system that is refreshed every day.

scholarship.title: Scholarship
scholarship.description: Showcasing CSUN's Faculty projects, research & expertise.
scholarship.details: A fully built web application for CSUN faculty and staff to showcase their research as well as a centralized hub for CSUN project grants.
scholarship.tech_stack: The application is written in Laravel, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and leverages internal APIs as well as an automated data sync with Cayuse.

mom.title: META+LAB Website
mom.details: CSUN META+LAB website explains what META+LAB is, showcases what we do and what highlights our primary product which is our students.
mom.tech_stack: The application is written in Laravel, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript as well as utilizing the traditional LAMP Stack.
